mosinstall.name: CB Online
mosinstall.author:
JoomlaJoe and Beat
Universally Native for Joomla 1.5, 1.0, Mambo 4.5, 4.6
(ignore compatibility warning in Joomla 1.5)
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 - 2008 joomlapolis.com. This module is released under the GNU/GPL v2 License
mosinstall.description: Displays a list of users logged in with a link to their profile.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (login), this allows individual module styling

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed above the list of users

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed below the list of users
